about_the_game:
PONGBALL
PongBall is the ultimate timeless classic: Pong with modern features! Step into an electrifying arena where quick reflexes and strategic play are your greatest allies. PongBall delivers a fresh twist on retro arcade gameplay, offering a fast-paced and addictive experience that will keep you coming back for more.
Variety of Arenas:
Explore a range of vibrant and uniquely themed arenas, each with its own set of challenges and obstacles. Master the intricacies of each level to gain the upper hand.
SKILLS
Use skills to get advantage against your enemy! But watch out skill can be used against you!

Engaging Single-Player Mode:
Hone your skills and complete challenging missions in a robust single-player campaign. Perfect your technique and unlock new content as you progress.
CASES
Open cases and get your brand new skin!
TOURNAMENTS
Draw random opponents and beat them!
Controllers Support
You can use your controller to beat opponents!
MULTIPLAYER (ONLINE PLANNED)
Beat your friend or play some tournaments!
- You can play Local Multiplayer now!
Why You’ll Love PongBall
PongBall combines the nostalgia of classic arcade games with modern twists and exciting features. Whether you're a seasoned gamer or new to the arcade scene, PongBall offers an accessible yet deeply engaging experience. With its intuitive controls, vibrant graphics, and endless replayability, PongBall is sure to become your new go-to game for both solo and multiplayer fun.
DISCORD
Stay updated with the latest news, updates, and tournaments by joining our growing community. Follow us on social media and participate in discussions with fellow PongBall enthusiasts. Your feedback helps us make PongBall even better!


Are you ready to experience the next evolution of arcade gaming? Download PongBall now and start your journey to becoming a PongBall legend!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7.6. Strigoi
  • Processor: Intel Xeon E5-2650 v4 10-Core 2.30 GHz 25 MB SmartCache SR2N3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GIGABYTE GeForce GT 710 2GB DR5, 2GB GDDR5
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: C-TECH SC-7Q
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 7.6. Strigoi
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-10700F
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GIGABYTE GeForce GT 710 2GB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Creative Sound Blaster Audigy RX

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.12
  • Processor: Apple M1
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M1
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: IK MULTIMEDIA iRig Stream
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.12
  • Processor: Apple M1 PRO
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M1 PRO
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: IK MULTIMEDIA iRig Mic Cast HD

name: PongBall

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Xeon E5-2650 v4 10-Core 2.30 GHz 25 MB SmartCache SR2N3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GIGABYTE GeForce GT 710 2GB DR5, 2GB GDDR5
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: C-TECH SC-7Q
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-10700F
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GIGABYTE GeForce GT 710 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Creative Sound Blaster Audigy RX

short_description: Do you remember one of the first games ever made? We've reimagined it in a modern way! Use your skills, open cases, unlock new skins, beat your opponents, play with friends, and experience so much more in PongBall!
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Polish, Czech
*languages with full audio support
